globalAttributes.name: jsonform-payload
globalAttributes.description: The value of this attribute is used as the payload to send if the attribute is set on a form with `hx-ext=json-form` (or having a `hx-*-json` attribute).

globalAttributes.name: hx-target-xx
globalAttributes.description: Target element to be swapped when receiving a given HTTP response code. https://htmx.org/extensions/response-targets/

globalAttributes.name: hx-target-error
globalAttributes.description: Target element to be swapped when receiving 4xx and 5xx HTTP response codes. https://htmx.org/extensions/response-targets/
